rules_text:
Slinking Raider can’t be blocked by creatures with greater power.
Whenever Slinking Raider deals damage to a player or noncreature permanent, put a +1/+1 counter on it.
Surpass {5}{R} [i]({5}{R}: Transform this creature.[/i]
[i]This costs {1} less to activate for each counter on it. Activate only as a sorcery.)[/i]
rules_text2:
Trample
Whenever Forthright Wrecker deals combat damage to a player or noncreature permanent, it deals that much damage to each planeswalker that player controls and each battle that player protects.
